title: ## Multilingual Semantics Reading List (2022 and Earlier

This list focuses on articles related to Word Sense Disambiguation (WSD), Semantic Role Labeling (SRL), and Semantic Parsing in a multilingual context. It includes both theoretical and practical approaches, with a mix of classic and recent works
**"Cross-Lingual Word Sense Disambiguation: A Survey"** by
- A comprehensive overview of WSD techniques and their application to cross-lingual scenarios

author.particle: Multilingual Word Sense Disambiguation Using Cross-Lingual Projections" by

title: - Explores the use of cross-lingual projections for WSD, leveraging parallel corpora
- Presents a multilingual WSD system based on a combination of monolingual and cross-lingual techniques

author.particle: Cross-Lingual Word Sense Disambiguation Using Bilingual Lexical Resources" by

title: - Explores the use of bilingual lexical resources for WSD, focusing on the role of sense alignments

author.particle: Multilingual Word Sense Disambiguation with Cross-Lingual Embeddings" by

title: - Proposes a novel approach using cross-lingual word embeddings for WSD, achieving state-of-the-art results
**Semantic Role Labeling (SRL)**
**"Cross-Lingual Semantic Role Labeling: A Survey"** by
- A comprehensive survey of cross-lingual SRL techniques, covering various approaches and challenges
**"Cross-Lingual Semantic Role Labeling Using Bilingual Lexical Resources"** by
- Explores the use of bilingual lexical resources for SRL, focusing on the role of sense alignments and cross-lingual projections
- Presents a multilingual SRL system based on a combination of monolingual and cross-lingual techniques
**"Cross-Lingual Semantic Role Labeling with Neural Networks"** by
- Explores the use of neural networks for cross-lingual SRL, achieving significant improvements over traditional methods
**"Multilingual Semantic Role Labeling with Cross-Lingual Transfer Learning"**
- Proposes a novel approach using cross-lingual transfer learning for SRL, achieving state-of-the-art results
**"Cross-Lingual Semantic Parsing: A Survey"** by
- A comprehensive survey of cross-lingual semantic parsing techniques, covering various approaches and challenges

author.particle: Cross-Lingual Semantic Parsing with Universal Dependencies" by

title: - Explores the use of Universal Dependencies for cross-lingual semantic parsing, leveraging the shared syntactic structure across languages
- Presents a multilingual semantic parsing system based on a combination of monolingual and cross-lingual techniques

author.particle: Cross-Lingual Semantic Parsing with Neural Networks" by

title: - Explores the use of neural networks for cross-lingual semantic parsing, achieving significant improvements over traditional methods
**"Multilingual Semantic Parsing with Cross-Lingual Transfer Learning"** by
- Proposes a novel approach using cross-lingual transfer learning for semantic parsing, achieving state-of-the-art results
**"Multilingual Semantic Representation: A Survey"** by
- A comprehensive survey of different approaches to multilingual semantic representation, covering various techniques and challenges
**"Cross-Lingual Semantic Similarity: A Survey"** by Pilehvar
- A survey of cross-lingual semantic similarity techniques, focusing on different methods and their applications
**"Multilingual Semantic Analysis: A Survey"** by
- A survey of multilingual semantic analysis techniques, covering various approaches and their applications
**"Multilingual Semantic Web: A Survey"** by
- A survey of the multilingual Semantic Web, focusing on different challenges and opportunities
**"Multilingual Natural Language Processing: A Survey"** by
- A comprehensive survey of multilingual NLP techniques, covering various approaches and their applications

This list provides a starting point for exploring the field of multilingual semantics. It is important to note that this is not an exhaustive list, and there are many other relevant articles and resources available
Remember to consult the references within these articles for further exploration and to stay updated on the latest advancements in the field
